name: Spooky the Coward
description:
Although Spooky is a ghost, he is terrified of darkness and always seeks the light. Help spooky get through illusionary blocks; around spikes; and to the safety of the light.

Controls:

Move using A,D

Jump using Space

Right Click to make illusionary blocks real

Left Click to shoot your grappling beam
